1.「あ…… あなたは……！？| まさか 地上の民なのですか……？: Oh... Are you...? Are you a citizen of the|earth?

2.「そんな……私を救おうなど 考えないで！| この魔物は 危険です！| 来てはいけ: You can't... Don't even think about trying to|save me! This demon is dangerous! You can't|come here.

3.「ああ…… どうして……。 | 私は 囚われの身のままで よかったのに。| 身を: Oh... Why... I'm glad I'm still a prisoner...|I'm not risking my life like this...

4.「私は あなたに | 救ってもらえるような者では ありません。| 海底の国を滅ぼ: I'm not the kind of person you can save. I'm|the one who destroyed the undersea kingdom.

5.「そうですね……。| あなたには すべて お話しするとしましょう。: Okay, well... I'll tell you everything.

6.「……ある晩 ちいさなイカが| この神殿に 現れました。| とても遠方から やっ: ... One night, a small squid appeared in this|temple. It seemed to have come from a great|distance.

7.「海底の民と よく似ているけれど違う…… | はじめて見る イカという生き物を前: Similar to the people of the ocean floor, but|different. I remember how bewildered we were|when we saw the squid for the first time...

8.「……彼女は 悲しい瞳で 私に言いました。| 私は たった ひとりきりのイカだ。: ... She told me with her sad eyes... I'm all|alone... I want a family of my own. ....

9.「私は その望みをかなえるべく 彼女の分身を | 創りました。私は 望むままに物:
I created an alter ego to fulfill her desire.|I hold in my hands a piece of the power of|creation that allows me to create things as I|
|wish.

10.「……しかし 今にして思えば| 身に余るチカラだったのでしょう……。: ... But now that I think about it, it must|have been more than I could handle...

11.「彼女の分身は 私の想定を超えて | みずからの分身を 生み出すチカラを| 持っ: Her alter ego has the power to create her own|alter ego beyond my expectations...

12.「ひたすらに増殖した 分身たちは心を持たず| あたりを破壊し…… 瞬く間に……|:
They multiply incessantly, mindlessly,|destroying everything in their path. In the|blink of an eye... The beauty of the sea...|
|The land beneath the sea...

13.「……私は 間違えていました。 | 異なる姿の者でも 家族として国に迎えてやれば:
I... I've made a mistake... It would have|been better if we had welcomed them into our|country as family, even if they looked|
|different...

14.「本当に必要なのは | 創生のチカラなどでは なかった……。: What we really needed was not the power of|creation...

15.「何千年 何万年 悔い続けても| 起きてしまった この事実は| もう どうしよう:
No matter how many thousands of years and|tens of thousands of years I regret, I can't|do anything about the fact that it|
|happened...

16.「けれど…… そうですね。| このような愚かな私を救ってくれた あなたや| 海底: But... Well... I can't repay you or the|people of the ocean floor for saving me from|this foolishness.

17.「この身が いつまで持つかは わかりませんが| これからは できるかぎり| 神殿: I don't know how much longer I can hold out,|but from now on, I'll try to purify the|temple as much as I can...

18.「ありがとう 地上の民よ。| これは 私たちの仲間の印。| どうか あなたに受け: Thank you. On the ground... This is our...|Please, you have to take this.

20.「せめて 私のチカラが 生み出す装備たちが| この時代を生きる あなたがたに|: At the very least, I hope that the equipment|I produce will be of some use to those of you|who live in this age...

21.偽物のアンルシアを使った ピュージュの|策略で キュロノスを倒した際 手に入れた:
The Purges, using the fake Anrushia, have|stolen the Seeds of War that we obtained when|we defeated Cyronos. We followed the Puge to|
|Gamilgo's Shield Island, where we were|attacked by a swarm of Puge... The ritual|using the Seed of War is complete, and the|
|gates to the Demon Realm are open...

22.門から出現した 魔族の将帥の一撃を浴び|気を失う寸前 何者かが近づいてきた。|目:
A demon general emerges from the gate, and|just as I'm about to pass out from the blow,|someone approaches. When I woke up, I found|
|myself in a strange world... I've been|transformed into something else... According|to Yushka, a young man who claims to be a|
|traveler of the demon tribe, this is the|demon world, and she has been transformed|into a demon by her blood contract with|
|him...

23.魔界の最高峰 デモンマウンテンのふもと|大審門で 山頂に住む魔仙卿と会わなくては:
You're the messenger of the Demon Lord of|Farazad, the Sand City. You're a messenger of|the Demon Lord of Farazad, the city of sand,|
|and together with Yushka, you're on a mission|to open the closed gates of the Zekres Magic|Kingdom and the Valdista Fortress to|
|encourage the Demon Lords of each country to|participate in the election of the Great|Demon Lord...

24.ゼクレス魔導国で 魔王アスバルと|バルディスタ要塞で 魔王ヴァレリアと会い|彼ら:
I met with the Demon Lord Asbal in the Zekres|Mage Kingdom and the Demon Lord Valeria in|the Valdista Fortress, and we agreed to meet|
|at the Grand Inquisitor's Gate to help them|solve their problems... When we arrived at|the Sand City of Farazad, we found out that|
|Yushka was the Demon Lord of Farazad... I'm|going to accompany Yushka to the Grand|Inquisitor's Gate again...

25.３人の魔王が 一堂に会し 大審門が開く。|デモンマウンテン山頂への道には 大魔王:
The three Demon Lords gathered at the Grand|Inquisitor's gate... On the way to the top of|Demon Mountain, there are many obstacles that|
|will test the mettle of the Great Demon|King... We've overcome the trials and|tribulations with Yushka, Asbal, Valeria and|
|the others, and arrived at the summit to find|the paradisiacal Garden of Jadin, where we'll|finally meet the Demon Lord...

27.「わしは 待っておった。| そなたのような若者が 現れることを。: I've been waiting for... A young man like|you...

28.「もし わしの味方になれば| アストルティアの半分を お前に やろう。: If you side with me, I'll give you half of|Astridia.

29.「どうじゃ？| わしの味方に なるか？<yesno><close>: What do you think? Do you want to be on my|side?<yesno><close>

30.「……そうか。| 味方になると 約束するのだな。: ...... I promise I'll be on your side...

32.「ここで そなたを 死霊の騎士にならしめ| わが先兵として アストルティア征服の: I will make you a Knight of the Dead, and you|will serve as my vanguard in the conquest of|Astrotasia!

34.「どうした？| 世界の半分を ほしくはないのか？| 悪い話では あるまい。<ye: What's the matter? Don't you want half the|world? It's not a bad idea...<yesno><close>

35.「では どうしても| このわしを 倒すと言うのだな！: So you're saying you must defeat me!

36.「おろか者め！| 思い知るがよい！！: You idiot! You know what you're doing!

37.道化師ピュージュを追って たどり着いた|ガミルゴの盾島で 瀕死の重傷を負い|目が:
You've just woken up on Gamilgo's Shield|Island after being mortally wounded in the|pursuit of the clown Puge. You've made a|
|blood pact with a demon traveler named|Yushka, and your form has been changed to|that of a demon. In order to return to his|
|original form, he travels with Yushka to the|three countries of the Demon World to meet|the Demon Lord who is beyond the Grand|
|Inquisitor's Gate...

38.ゼクレス魔導国で 魔王アスバルと|バルディスタ要塞で 魔王ヴァレリアと会い|砂の:
I've met the Demon Lord Asbal in the Zekres|Mage Kingdom, the Demon Lord Valeria in the|Valdista Fortress, and in the Sand City of|
|Farazad, I found out that Yushka is also one|of the Demon Lords. He and the three Demon|Lords climbed Demon Mountain to meet the|
|Demon Lord, and he was nominated to be the|next Great Demon Lord.

40.ゴーラの事件の解決直後 ヴァレリアが現れ|魔瘴の巫女イルーシャを連れ去ろうとする:
Just after the Gora incident was solved,|Valeria appeared and tried to take away the|miasma priestess Ilusha, but she was stolen|
|by Farazad, who was spearheaded by Yushka,|who was hiding among the soldiers. Enraged,|Valeria decides to start a war, which leads|
|to the Valdista army invading the Jarimbach|Desert...

41.魔仙卿の指示で向かった 旧ネクロデア領で|ユシュカの副官 ナジーンと再会し|彼の:
In the Necrodean realm, we meet Yushka's|second-in-command, Najine, who leads us to|Farazad... It was revealed that the|
|kidnapping of Ilusha was a ruse by Yushka to|provoke Valdista, and with the addition of|the Zekres Magic Kingdom, the Demon World War|
|broke out with three nations fighting each|other...

42.王太后エルガドーラの操る ミアラの宝杖で|太古の魔人と化した アスバルが放つ光線:
The Queen Mother, Elgadora, has transformed|Asbal into an ancient demoness with the power|of Miara's staff. Najine, who was defending|
|Yushka from the rays, lost her life. Valdista|was defeated, and the great battle seemed to|have ended with Zekres' victory. But Lord|
|Mashen, who sees demons as a danger, has|asked me to destroy Miara's staff...

43.バルディスタは ゼクレスへの復讐戦を挑み|戦いは 次の舞台へ。ゼクレス城の中庭で:
Valdista challenged Zekres to a war of|vengeance, which led to the next battle... In|the courtyard of Zekres' castle, Valeria is|
|struck by a demon's ray... With the help of|Yushka, who came to her rescue, she defeated|the ancient demon and the war between the|
|three kingdoms ended in pain... In order to|receive a new mission, I'm going to visit the|Demon Lord at the Goda Temple in the Garden|
|of Jadin...

44.ガミルゴの盾島の戦いで 瀕死の重傷を負い|魔族の旅人ユシュカに 連れ去られた魔界:
After being mortally wounded in the battle of|Gamilgo's Shield Island, she was taken away|by the demon traveler Yushka. He was taken|
|away by a demon traveler named Yushka, who|had been transformed into a demon by a blood|pact. He meets the Demon Lord Asbal in the|
|Zecres Magic Kingdom, the Demon Lord Valeria|in the Valdista Fortress, and in the Sand|City of Farazad, he discovers that Yushka is|
|also one of the Demon Lords...

45.次の大魔王を決めるため おもむいた |デモンマウンテンの山頂で 魔仙卿と対面し|:
On the summit of Demon Mountain, he meets the|Demon Lord and touches the statue of the|source of darkness, and the statue shatters,|
|revealing a mysterious girl named Ilusha.|Ahead of the coming major miasma season, the|countries of the demon world are scheming|
|over Ilusha's ability to control the|miasma... It's the beginning of a war called|the Demon World War...

46.三国相撃つ バルディア山岳地帯の戦いで|ファラザードの副官 ナジーンが命を落とし:
In the battle of Bardia Mountain, Farazad's|second-in-command, Najine, lost her life, and|in the battle of Zekres Castle, Valeria, the|
|demon king of Bardista, disappeared, and|Elgadora, the queen of Zekres, died. The war|that covered the entire demon world dealt a|
|great blow to each of the three countries,|and ended...

47.魔仙卿の依頼で 戦後の復興に苦戦する|ゼクレス バルディスタを救済することに。|:
At the request of the Demon Lord, we've come|to the aid of Zekres Valdista, who is|struggling to recover from the war... In the|
|Zekres Magical Kingdom, the Grand Duke Ojalos|is plotting to usurp the throne... The demon|king Asbal is determined to lead his country|
|by killing his mother, who was turned into a|monster and then into a bomb with his own|hands...

48.バルディスタ要塞では 玉座を狙う賊徒が|暴れており ヴァレリアの生存を信じる|ベ:
In the fortress of Valdista, the bandits are|on the rampage, and Beltro, who believes|Valeria is alive, has asked me to find her...|
|The curse of the Fountain has turned Valeria|into a young woman named Tyria, and she has|been returned to her rightful place. After|
|rescuing the two nations, he returns to the|Temple of Goda, where Yushka appears and|convinces him that he must become the new|
|Great Demon King.

49.ユシュカの提案に乗るか 決めかねていると|魔仙卿が正体を明かし 世界を守るため|:
As I was deciding whether or not to accept|Yushka's proposal, the Demon Lord revealed|himself and promised to become the Great|
|Demon Lord to protect the world... Asubaru|and Valeria also agreed to accept the title|of the Great Demon Lord, and the coronation|
|ceremony was held at the castle that was|kindly given to them by Yushka...

50.戴冠式の場で 魔仙卿は 魔瘴魂の怪物を|呼び寄せ 参列者を襲わせる。魔界は|アス:
At the coronation, Lord Immortal summoned the|demon miasma monster to attack the attendees.|Lord Immortal disappeared, leaving behind a|
|message that the Demon Realm is a place cut|off from Astrutia. Carlow, my chamberlain,|has something to tell me. Heading for the|
|throne room of the Great Demon's Castle...

51.ガミルゴの盾島の戦いで 瀕死の重傷を負い|魔族の旅人ユシュカに 連れ去られた魔界:
After being mortally wounded in the battle of|Gamilgo's Shield Island, she was taken away|by the demon traveler Yushka. He was taken|
|away by a demon traveler named Yushka, who|had been transformed into a demon by a blood|pact. He meets the Demon Lord Asbal in the|
|Zecres Magic Kingdom, the Demon Lord Valeria|in the Valdista Fortress, and in the Sand|City of Farazad, he discovers that Yushka is|
|also one of the Demon Lords...

52.デモンマウンテンの山頂で 魔仙卿と対面し|魔瘴をあやつる少女 イルーシャとも|出:
On the summit of Demon Mountain, he meets the|Lord Demoness, and also meets Ilusha, the|girl who can control the demon miasma... She|
|was able to return to her demon form, but a|quarrel over her ability led to a huge battle|involving the three countries of the demon|
|world... After a fierce battle, each of the|three countries suffers tremendous damage,|and the Demon World War comes to an end...

54.新たな大魔王の強さを 魔界の民に示すため|反乱の芽を 自ら 潰すことになる。|潜:
In order to show the people of the demon|world how strong the new Great Demon Lord is,|he has decided to crush the seeds of|
|rebellion himself... In order to show the|people of the demon world that he is the new|Great Demon King, he has to destroy the seeds|
|of rebellion himself. As the Great Demon|King's fame steadily grows, a large amount of|demon miasma erupts in the Zahadigarh|
|Rocks...

55.駆けつけた ザハディガル岩峰では|フードを被った謎の集団が 目撃されており |彼:
We rushed to the Zahadigal Ridge, where a|mysterious group of hooded figures had been|spotted, and they were able to stop the|
|miasma from spewing out. The hoods appear in|the castle of the Great Demon King... The|true identity of the hooded group is the|
|brave princess Anrucia and her friends who|are trying to defeat the Great Demon King...|After the ruckus that ensued between the|
|heroes and the Demon Lord, the Demon Lord|turned out to be an ally...

56.ジャディンの園で 魔瘴があふれ出したとの|報告が入り アンルシア イルーシャ|ユ:
We received a report of a miasma overflowing|in the Garden of Jadin, and we headed there|with Anrushka, Ilusha, and Yushka... In the|
|depths of Demon Mountain, there's a huge|cavern where the Temple of Jagonuba stands|tall. In the depths of the temple stands the|
|Demon Lord, the God of Doom. He tried to|suppress Jagonubas, but his attempts failed|and he was swallowed by the demon miasma...

57.半覚醒のジャゴヌバは ただのひと息で |勇者を 魔王を 大魔王を 圧倒する。|か:
The half-awakened Jagonuba, with a single|breath, overpowered the heroes, the Demon|Lord, and the Great Demon Lord... The only|
|one who could hold it off was Jushka's|master... Marlene the Wise... But she's the|only one left in the temple... and they'll|
|have to return to the Great Demon's castle.|Naladzia woke up and went to the infirmary in|the east wing of the Great Demon Castle.

58.ガミルゴの盾島の戦いで 瀕死の重傷を負い|魔族の旅人ユシュカに 連れ去られた魔界:
After being mortally wounded in the battle of|Gamilgo's Shield Island, she was taken away|by the demon traveler Yushka. He was taken|
|away by a demon traveler named Yushka, who|had been transformed into a demon by a blood|pact. He meets the Demon Lord Asbal in the|
|Zecres Magic Kingdom, the Demon Lord Valeria|in the Valdista Fortress, and in the Sand|City of Farazad, he discovers that Yushka is|
|also one of the Demon Lords...

59.次の大魔王を決めるため おもむいた |デモンマウンテンの山頂で 魔仙卿と対面し|:
On the summit of Demon Mountain, he meets the|Demon Lord and touches the statue of the|source of darkness, and the statue shatters,|
|revealing a mysterious girl named Ilusha. In|the days leading up to the Great Demon Miasma|Period, the countries of the demon world are|
|scheming over Ilusha's ability to control the|demon miasma... It's the beginning of a war|called the Demon World War...

60.三国相撃つ バルディア山岳地帯の戦いで|ファラザードの副官 ナジーンが命を落とし:
In the battle of Bardia Mountain, Farazad's|second-in-command, Najine, lost her life, and|in the battle of Zekres Castle, Valeria, the|
|demon king of Bardista, disappeared, and|Elgadora, the queen of Zekres, died. The war|that covered the entire demon world dealt a|
|great blow to each of the three countries,|and ended...

61.魔仙卿の依頼で 戦後の復興に苦戦する|ゼクレス バルディスタを救済することに。|:
At the request of the Demon Lord, we've come|to the aid of Zekres Valdista, who is|struggling to recover from the war... In the|
|Zekres Magical Kingdom, the Grand Duke Ojalos|is plotting to usurp the throne... The demon|king Asbal is determined to lead his country|
|by killing his mother, who was turned into a|monster and then into a bomb with his own|hands...

62.バルディスタ要塞では 玉座を狙う賊徒が|暴れており ヴァレリアの生存を信じる|ベ:
In the fortress of Valdista, the bandits are|on the rampage, and Beltro, who believes|Valeria is alive, has asked me to find her...|
|The curse of the Fountain has turned Valeria|into a young woman named Tyria, and she has|been returned to her rightful place. After|
|rescuing the two nations, he returns to the|Temple of Goda, where Yushka appears and|convinces him that he must become the new|
|Great Demon King.

63.ユシュカの提案に乗るか 決めかねていると|魔仙卿が正体を明かし 世界を守るため|:
As I was deciding whether or not to accept|Yushka's proposal, the Demon Lord revealed|himself and promised to become the Great|
|Demon Lord to protect the world... Asubaru|and Valeria also agreed to accept the title|of the Great Demon Lord, and the coronation|
|ceremony was held at the castle that was|kindly given to them by Yushka...

64.戴冠式の場で 魔仙卿は 魔瘴魂の怪物を|呼び寄せ 参列者を襲わせる。魔界は|アス:
At the coronation, Lord Immortal summoned the|demon miasma monster to attack the attendees.|Lord Immortal disappeared, leaving behind a|
|message that the Demon Realm is a place cut|off from Astrutia. Carlow, my chamberlain,|has something to tell me. Heading for the|
|throne room of the Great Demon's Castle...

68.ユシュカの師匠 賢者マリーンの助言により|ジャゴヌバに対抗する 唯一の手段として:
On the advice of Yushka's mentor, the sage|Marlene, the goddess of creation, Luthiana,|has been resurrected as the only means of|
|resisting the Jagonubas... In the land of|light, Finetoka, it's revealed that Ilusha is|the goddess's consort... From the six holy|
|circles, it is said that the way to revive|the goddess is to visit the shrines of the|goddesses throughout Astrutia with Ilusha,|
|her consort.

69.祠巡りをしていく中 女神を復活させると|イルーシャが 消滅してしまうこと……|イ:
As we toured the shrine, we learned that if|we resurrected the goddess, Ilusha would|disappear. Ilsha's twin, Naradzia, is a|
|reincarnation of Jagonubas and has been taken|over by his will. Ilsha, who manifested the|goddess's will, left with Naradzia and her|
|servants, the Puju, the evil gods of|abomination...

70.イルーシャを追って 女神復活のための|儀式が行われる ルファ神殿へ行くことに。|:
We'll follow Ilusha to the temple of Rufa,|where the ritual for the resurrection of the|goddess is held... I'm going to the temple of|
|Rufa, where the ritual for the resurrection|of the goddess is held.

71.女神の復活と時を同じくして ジャゴヌバも|また 完全覚醒し 二柱の大神による|世:
At the same time as the Goddess was|resurrected, Jagonubas was also fully|awakened, and the battle for the fate of the|
|world between the two great gods unfolded...|After absorbing the evil gods defeated by|Luthiana and raising their abilities,|
|Jagonubas struck a blow that defeated the|Goddess and left the world in despair. I need|to speak with Carlow, the chamberlain... He's|
|on his way to the throne room of the Great|Demon Castle...
